schema.title: Carousel
schema.description: A web-component powered carousel component for cycling through a series of content such as images, text, or cards.

attributes.title: Attributes (Twig-only)
attributes.description: A Drupal attributes object. Used to apply with extra HTML attributes to the outer <bolt-carousel> tag.

slides.title: Slides (Twig-only)
slides.description: Array of content to include in the carousel. Note: each slide gets wrapped with a <bolt-carousel-slide> automatically.

slides_per_view.description: Controls the number of slides to be shown at once.

slides_per_group.description: Controls the number of slides to be swiped at once.

max_slides_per_view.description: Limits the maximum number of slides that can display at any screen size. Combine this with the slidesPerView option to get the benefits of automatically adjusting the number of slides displayed at different screen sizes while putting a max limit of how many slides display at once.

space_between.description: Controls the horizontal spacing between each slide.

slide_offset_before.description: Controls whether or not carousel content should be offset by 5px at the start.

slide_offset_after.description: Controls whether or not carousel content should be offset by 5px at the end.

nav_button_position.description: Positions the previous and next buttons to either inside or outside of the carousel container.

no_pagination.description: Removes the pagination. Not recommended unless being used with an alternative UI to display carousel progress (such as custom thumbnail previews).

no_scrollbar.description: Removes the scrollbar. Not recommended unless being used with an alternative UI to display carousel progress (such as custom thumbnail previews).

no_min_width.description: Disables the slide min width logic. Typically not recommended unless being used with an alternative UI to display carousel progress (such as custom thumbnail previews).

mode.description: Switches between the default carousel mode and the image gallery mode.

no_nav_buttons.description: Visually hide the previoius and next nav buttons.

slide_to_clicked_slide.description: Set to true and click on any slide will produce transition to this slide.

autoplay.description: Allows the carousel to automatically rotate through its slides until the user interacts with it.

loop.description: Enables continuous loop mode. Note: the loop option is temporarily disabled and will be re-enabled in a future Bolt release.

free_scroll.description: Enables content to be freely scrolled and flicked without snapping to an end position. Automatically switches off the pagination and switches on the scrollbar.

first_slide_message.description: Accessible label for the previous button when the carousel is on the first slide.

last_slide_message.description: Accessible label for previous button when the carousel is on the last slide.

pagination_bullet_message.description: Accessible label for a single pagination bullet.

schema.title: Bolt Placeholder
schema.description: Placeholders carve out space for other WIP content and components.

animated.title: Animated
animated.description: Should this placeholder have an animated border?

items.description: All of the items in the accordion. Each item should contain a header and a content.

content.description: Epanadable content of an item.

open.description: Automatically expand an item on page load.

uuid.description: Unique ID for an item, randomly generated if not provided.

open_label.description: Accessible label for the open trigger to expand an item.

close_label.description: Accessible label for the close trigger to collapse an item.

single.description: Allow only one section to open at a time.

no_separator.title: no_separator (twig) / no-separator (web component)
no_separator.description: Hides the separator in between items.

box_shadow.title: box_shadow (twig) / box-shadow (web component)
box_shadow.description: Creates a box shadow around the accordion.

spacing.description: Controls the inset spacing of each item.

icon_valign.title: icon_valign (twig) / icon-valign (web component)
icon_valign.description: Vertically align the accordion trigger content and trigger icon.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

max_items_per_row.description: The max amount of items (action blocks) to be displayed in one row.

valign.description: Vertical alignment of the content inside each action block.

borderless.description: Removes the border in between each action block.

contentItems.description: Content items to populate the action blocks.

collapse.description: `True` to hide toggle until mobile screen size

content.description: **All of the items in the dropdown** -- generally works by including `@bolt-components-nav/nav.twig` with `links` array of objects containing `text` & `url`

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

overlay.description: Should an overlay be used for this background.

shapeGroup.description: Add a Bolt Background Shapes group.

fill.description: Type of fill to use for the overlay.

focalPoint.description: Where the opacity background should originate.

vertical.description: Currently doesn't use this value. Intended future application.

contentItems.description: An array of objects to place in the background.

shapeGroup.description: The shapeGroup to use to build the shapes layout.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

content.description: Main content of the band.

upper.description: Pinned to the upper area of the band.

content.description: A pinned area can contain 1 or more items.

align.description: Horizontal alignment of a single item.

lower.description: Pinned to the lower area of the band.

content.description: A pinned area can contain 1 or more items.

align.description: Horizontal alignment of a single item.

tag.description: Controls the semantic HTML tag to use for the band's content.

size.description: Controls the vertical spacing of the band.

full_bleed.description: If set to true, the band will take the full width of the page.

theme.description: Controls the theme of the band.

row_gutter.title: DEPRECATED
row_gutter.description: Please use `pinned_content`. Instructions on how to use `pinned_content` is on the Band with Pinned Content demo page.

content_row_start.title: DEPRECATED
content_row_start.description: Please use `pinned_content`. Instructions on how to use `pinned_content` is on the Band with Pinned Content demo page.

items.title: DEPRECATED
items.description: Please use `content` and `pinned_content`. Instructions on how to use `pinned_content` is on the Band with Pinned Content demo page.

fullBleed.title: DEPRECATED
fullBleed.description: This prop has been renamed. Please use `full_bleed`.

contentTag.title: DEPRECATED
contentTag.description: This prop is no longer needed. `tag` takes care of the semantic markup automatically.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

items.title: The content items
items.description: All of the items in the block list - can have simple text **or** `items`
Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single list item

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

content.description:
Text to appear in blockquote (Twig only). May be plain text or text wrapped in

tags.

alignItems.description: Aligns items left, center, or right.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

items.description: Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single breadcrumb

schema.title: Bolt Button
schema.description: Buttons are the core of our action components.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

transform.description: Transforms the button text to various cases.

tag.description: Determines the semantic HTML tag for the button.

style.description: Style of the button determined by information hierarchy.

width.description: Controls the width of the button.

border_radius.description: Rounds the corners of the button.

align.description: Horizontal alignment of items (text and icon) inside the button. Note: the values left and right are deprecated, use start and end instead.

icon.description: Icon data as expected by the icon component. Accepts an additional position prop that determines placement within the button.

iconOnly.description: Make the button to display only the icon and hide the text (which is still required). You are required to pass both text and icon data for this option to work.

tag.description: Html tag to wrap the button group.

items.description: Bolt button information.
Bolt component information.

content.description: A string of content to place in the button group.

tag.description: Html tag immediately within the `bolt-card` element.

contentTag.description: Html tag immediately within the `bolt-card` element.

url.description: Providing a URL will make the entire card link to another resource. This is a future prop and does not do anything right now.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

url.description: Optional. When url is present, tag changes to `a`, otherwise tag would be `span`.

tag.description: Html tag to be used. If a URL is provided, this will be ignored and `a` will be always be used.

items.description: An array of Chips.
Chip.

contentItems.title: DEPRECATED
contentItems.description: Deprecated (will be removed in Bolt v3.0) - use the items prop instead.

items.description: Chip.

schema.title: Code Snippet
schema.description: Monospace Font Styles for Code Text

display.title: Display
display.description: Defines if the code text is inline or block.

syntax.title: Syntax Highlighting
syntax.description: Toggle between a light and dark syntax highlighting, or turn it off. Separate from Bolt theming.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

copiedText.title: DEPRECATED
copiedText.description: Use the custom_confirmation property instead if you need to change the confirmation text.

iconSize.title: DEPRECATED
iconSize.description: Use custom_trigger, custom_transition, and custom_confirmation properties if you need to change icon size.

trigger_text.description: Text to use for the inital copy button.  Ignored if the custom_trigger property is used.

text_to_copy.description: The text to copy to the clipboard.

custom_trigger.description: (optional) Custom content to show for the initial copy trigger.  If you pass a link, set the URL to '#!' since it should not being followed.

custom_transition.description: (optional) Custom content to show while copy is in progress.  This content will be rotated while the copying happens, so it's recommended to pass an icon.

custom_confirmation.description: (optional) Custom content to show after a successful copy.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

media.description: Media accepts either image, icon, video, or table.

content.title: DEPRECATED.
content.description: Figure contains no content. Only media and caption.

icon_size.description: Customize the size of the input icon used

text.description: Renderable text content of the headline.

url.description: If provided, turns headline into a link to given url.

icon.description: Bolt icon. Accepts either 1) an icon name as a string 2) an icon object as expected by `@bolt-components-icon` or 3) the string "none" to explicitly remove default icons

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

background.description: Background shape. This applies *only* to 'xlarge' icons.

color.description: Icon color. Currently only support default (black) and teal.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

lazyload.description: Lazyload can boost performance by loading images on demand, instead of on initial page load.

no_lazy.description: Override the default lazyload behavior. Used only on the web component, where the presence of a boolean property always equates to `true`.

placeholder_color.description: A valid CSS background color property shown while image loads.

placeholder_image.description: Image path or image data shown while image loads.

srcset.description: A comma seperated string of image urls and image widths, used for optimizing image loading performance.

sizes.description: A list of one or more strings separated by commas indicating a set of source sizes. Each source size consists of a media condition (omitted for the last item), and a source size value. Learn more.

ratio.title: boolean option is DEPRECATED
ratio.description: Set the aspect ratio for the image via slash-separated width and height values, e.g. 4/3. Currently required for aspect ratio to be applied properly. Set to "none" to opt out of aspect ratio.

max_width.description: Set the max-width of the image as a valid CSS value, e.g. "300px" or "50%".

width.title: DEPRECATED
width.description: Override the default width of the image. If no height is provided, aspect ratio will be maintained.

height.title: DEPRECATED
height.description: Override the default height of the image. If no width is provided, aspect ratio will be maintained.

cover.description: Set an image to fill its container.

imageAttributes.title: DEPRECATED
imageAttributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

display.description: Display either an inline link or flex link (icons can hang on either side).

valign.description: Controls the vertical alignment of text and icon.

text.description: Renderable text content for the link.

url.description: Contains a URL that the link points to. This may also be passed as part of `attributes`.

target.description: Specifies where to display the linked URL. This may also be passed as part of `attributes`.

icon.description: Bolt icon. Accepts the same options as Bolt Icon Component `@bolt-components-icon` plus an additional 'position' parameter that determines placement within the button.

isHeadline.description: Whether this link should get special headline styling treatment.

schema.title: List
schema.description: Minimal list component for laying out a group of items.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

items.description: All items can be simple text or `items`.
Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single list item.

tag.description: Apply the semantic tag for the list.

display.description: Display either an inline list of items or a block (stacked) list of items. Responsive options are also available for transforming from block to inline at specific breakpoints.

spacing.description: Control the spacing in between items.

separator.description: Display a separator in between items.

inset.description: Turn spacing to the inside of each item.

align.description: Control the horizontal alignment of items.

valign.description: Control the vertical alignment of items.

attributes.title: Attributes (Twig-only)
attributes.description: A Drupal attributes object. Used to apply with extra HTML attributes to the outer <bolt-modal> tag.

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: Default `disabled` prop supported globally by most Bolt components.

no_shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Twig-only)
no_shadow.description: Manually disables the component from rendering to the Shadow DOM in a Twig template. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is handled globally based on browser support.

no-shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Web Component-only)
no-shadow.description: Manually disables the web component from rendering to the Shadow DOM. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is handled globally based on browser support.

width.description: Controls the width of the modal container.

spacing.description: Controls the spacing around the modal container.

theme.description: Controls the color theme of the modal container.

uuid.description: Unique ID for modal, randomly generated if not provided.

slots.description: There are 3 sections (slots) within the modal container. By assigning the appropriate slot name, content will be passed into the respective section.

default.description: The body section of the modal container.

header.description: The header section of the modal container.

footer.description: The footer section of the modal container.

offset.description: Number of pixels taken up by sticky items at the top of the page.  Used for smooth scroll and gumshoe.

moreText.description: Button text that displays when the Priority+ Nav Dropdown is displayed

offset.description: (Inherited from nav-indicator) Number of pixels taken up by sticky items at the top of the page.  Used for smooth scroll and gumshoe.

theme.description: Color theme. Can be set to 'none' for a transparent background.

title.description: Navbar title. Icon is optional. Tag can be set to h1 to h6 depending on the page.

name.description: Name of the (optional) icon to be used.

center.description: Determines if you want the Navbar content to be center aligned or not

width.description: Adjusts the Navbar's overall maximum width behavior -- either filling up the entire browser's total screen width (full) or just the component's parent container width (auto).

moreText.description: (Inherited from nav-priority) Button text that displays when the Priority+ Nav Dropdown is displayed.

offset.description: (Inherited from nav-indicator) Number of pixels taken up by sticky items at the top of the page.  Used for smooth scroll and gumshoe.

schema.title: Navlink
schema.description: Navlinks are stylized links used within the Navbar

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

active.description: Automatically mark a Navlink as active

text.description: Renderable text content for the link.

url.description: A url to link to.  This may also be passed as part of `attributes`

icon.description: Icon data as expected by the icon component.  Accepts an additional 'position' parameter that determines placement within the Navlink.

schema.title: Logo
schema.description: Note that logo accepts all the same parameters as the bolt-image component in addition to the properties below.

invert.description: Set to true to invert the logo colors.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

pages.description: A keyed array of page item objects where the key is the page number

items.description: A single page link object

href.description: The link for this pager item.  Href may also be passed as part of attributes (which will take precedence).

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object for this link.

first.description: A link object for the first page

href.description: The link for this pager item. Href may also be passed as part of attributes (which will take precedence).

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object for this link.

previous.description: A link object for the previous page (e.g. if on page 3, this links to page 2)

href.description: The link for this pager item. Href may also be passed as part of attributes (which will take precedence)

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object for this link.

next.description: A link object for the next page (e.g. if on page 3, this links to page 4)

href.description: The link for this pager item. Href may also be passed as part of attributes (which will take precedence)

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object for this link.

last.description: A link object for the last page

href.description: The link for this pager item. Href may also be passed as part of attributes (which will take precedence)

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object for this link.

previousText.title: Previous text
previousText.description: Text to be displayed for the previous anchor

nextText.title: Next text
nextText.description: Text to be displayed for the next anchor

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

text.description: Defines the label text in front of the social icons.

size.description: Controls the size of icons and spacing.

align.description: Controls the horizontal alignment of label text and icons.

opacity.description: Controls the overall transparency of the share tool.

sources.description: Social media sources to share to.

name.description: Name of the social media source.

url.description: The specifically formed share URL with query string.

inline.title: DPRECATED.
inline.description: Button version has been removed so this prop is no longer needed.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

content.description: Renderable content (e.g. a string, render array, or included pattern) to display within a modal at mobile breakpoints.  Typically, this is where the filters themselves go.

attributes.title: Attributes (Twig-only)
attributes.description: A Drupal attributes object. Used to apply with extra HTML attributes to the outer <bolt-stack> tag.

spacing.description: Control the spacing in between items.

content.description: Content of the stack.

no_shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Twig-only)
no_shadow.description: Manually disables the component from rendering to the Shadow DOM in a Twig template. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is handled globally based on browser support.

no-shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Web Component-only)
no-shadow.description: Manually disables the web component from rendering to the Shadow DOM. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is handled globally based on browser support.

schema.title: Table
schema.description: Table layout for tabular content.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

headers.description: Generates top and side headers, each can contain an array of `cells`.

cells.description: Each item represents a cell in the top header.
Each item represents a cell in the side header.

rows.description: Generates an array of rows, each can contain an array of `cells`.

cells.description: Each item represents a cell in a row.

footer.description: Generates a table footer, can contain an array of `cells`.

cells.description: Each item represents a cell in the footer.

format.description: Display either a regular table or a more complex numeric table.

borderless.description: Removes the vertical border in between cells.

first_col_fixed_width.description: Sets the width of the first column to be as wide as the longest text.

headlines.description: An array of headline component objects

items.description: Headline text components

content.description: Body text of teaser

buttons.description: An array of button component objects

items.description: A button

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

display.description: Inline text or a block of text.

color.description: Text color in context of theme colors.

line-height.description: Line height in context of the typographic design.

letter-spacing.description: Letter spacing in context of the typographic design.

text-transform.description: Transform controls the type case. Please note that capitalize would capitalize the first letter of each word, it is not the same as title case.

font-family.description: Font family in context of the typographic design.

font-size.description: Font size in context of the typographic design.

font-weight.description: Font weight in context of the typographic design.

headline.description: A preset for headlines in context of the typographic design.

subheadline.description: A preset for subheadlines in context of the typographic design.

eyebrow.description: A preset for eyebrow in context of the typographic design.

url.description: If provided, turns headline into a link to given url.

util.description: Each item in the array will build a utility class. No need to include `u-bolt-`. **For the web component** use comma separated string.

trigger.description: Provides the data for our trigger type

type.description: What kind of trigger are we using?

icon.description: Properties for including an icon with our trigger

name.description: Name of the icon to be used

toggle.description: If using a `button` set optional toggle text / icon

content.description: This can be text OR an included bolt component (like Block List)

direction.description: Should tooltip push up or down?

spacing.description: Spacing within our tooltip content bubble

schema.title: Bolt Trigger
schema.description: Triggers add button or link behavior to any content without the default button or link styles.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

content.description: Main content of the trigger (Twig only).

url.description: Contains a URL that the link points to. This may also be passed as part of `attributes`.

target.description: Specifies where to display the linked URL. This may also be passed as part of `attributes`.

cursor.description: Type of cursor shown on hover.

on_click.description: The name of a method on the `on_click_target`.

on_click_target.description: `className` (e.g. "js-click-me") used in `querySelector` to reference a web component on the page. `onClick`, the `on_click` method name will be called on this element.

no_outline.description: Turn off the default outline on focus

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

items.description: A single list item object with either a `text` or `contentItems` key
All items can be simple text or `items`.
Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single list item.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

items.description: A single list item object with either a `text` or `contentItems` key
All items can be simple text or `items`.
Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single list item.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

accountID.description: ID of the Brightcove account that owns the video.

videoUuid.description: A unique identifying string, randomly generated if not provided.

share_description.description: A custom title to use in the share overlay

collapsed.description: Should the video be collapsed on load.

showMeta.description: Should the video show meta data.

showMetaTitle.description: Should the video show meta title.

controls.description: Should the video controls be available.

autoplay.description: Should the video auto-play on load.

isBackgroundVideo.description: Set to true if the video is a background.

on_init.description: The `on_init` config allows for an external Javascript function inlined on the page to add any 3rd party scripts or video plugins to a `<bolt-video>` player instance when initializing. Please see the new recommended `enabled_plugins` and `disabled_plugins` options below.

default_plugins.description: An array of the default `<bolt-video>` player plugins that are globally enabled by default.

available_plugins.description: The built-in `<bolt-video>` player plugins that are availble to be used in any player instance without requiring the use of any extra Javascript.

enabled_plugins.description: Space-separated list of built-in `<bolt-video>` plugins for Brightcove to enable. Current include `social`, `email`, `playback`, and `cue`. For example: `<bolt-video enabled-plugins="cue social email playback">`.

disabled_plugins.description: Space-separated list of any built-in `<bolt-video>` plugins for Brightcove to disable. Used to opt-out of any video plugins that are enabled by default (ex. the `playback` plugin). For example: `<bolt-video disabled-plugins="playback">`.

schema.title: Bolt Grid
schema.description: A flexible 12-column grid with responsive breakpoint options.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

gutter.description: Spacing between the columns of the grid.

row_gutter.description: Spacing between the rows of the grid.

items.description: Array of grid items to render inside the grid.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

content.description: Content to render inside each grid item.

valign.description: Vertical alignment of the grid item itself.

column_start.description: The vertical starting point of the grid item. This accepts any number from `1` to `12`, and their perspective responsive variations for advanced usage, for example, `6@small` means the column start is set at 6 for any browser width larger and equal to the small breakpoint. This prop is required to make the grid work in Internet Explorer.

column_span.description: The number of columns the grid item should span across. This accepts any number from `1` to `12`, and their perspective responsive variations for advanced usage, for example, `6@small` means the column span is set at 6 for any browser width larger and equal to the small breakpoint.

row_start.description: The horizontal starting point of the grid item. This prop is required to make the grid work in Internet Explorer.

row_span.description: The number of rows the grid item should span across.

schema.title: Bolt Ratio
schema.description: A small helper-component that display's nested content / other components at a specific aspect ratio.

attributes.title: Attributes (Twig-only)
attributes.description: A Drupal attributes object. Used to apply with extra HTML attributes to the outer <bolt-ratio> tag.

children.title: Children (Twig-only)
children.description: Nested content to nest inside the <bolt-ratio> component when used in a Twig template.

ratio.title: Ratio (Twig & Web Component)
ratio.description: Set the aspect ratio for the ratio object via slash-separated width and height values, e.g. 4/3, 16/9, 1/1, etc.

aspectRatioWidth.title: Deprecated
aspectRatioWidth.description: Twig-specific prop for setting the width portion of the component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

aspect-ratio-width.title: Deprecated
aspect-ratio-width.description: Web component-specific prop for setting the width portion of the bolt-ratio web component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

aspectRatioHeight.title: Deprecated
aspectRatioHeight.description: Twig-specific prop for setting the height portion of the component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

aspect-ratio-height.title: Deprecated
aspect-ratio-height.description: Web component-specific prop for setting the height portion of the bolt-ratio web component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

no_css_vars.title: Disable CSS Custom Prop Rendering (Twig-only)
no_css_vars.description: Manually disables CSS Variable-based rendering for <bolt-ratio> in Twig templates. Useful for testing cross browser functionality. By default this is automatically enabled / disabled based on browser support for CSS Vars.

no-css-vars.title: No CSS Vars (Web Component-only)
no-css-vars.description: Manually disables CSS Variable-based rendering on the <bolt-ratio> custom element. Useful for testing cross browser functionality. By default this is automatically enabled / disabled based on browser support for CSS Vars.

no_shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Twig-only)
no_shadow.description: Manually disables the component from rendering to the Shadow DOM in a Twig template. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is enabled / disabled based on browser support.

no-shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Web Component-only)
no-shadow.description: Manually disables the web component from rendering to the Shadow DOM. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is enabled / disabled based on browser support.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

item.description: Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single list item.

schema.title: Carousel
schema.description: A web-component powered carousel component for cycling through a series of content such as images, text, or cards.

attributes.title: Attributes (Twig-only)
attributes.description: A Drupal attributes object. Used to apply with extra HTML attributes to the outer <bolt-carousel> tag.

slides.title: Slides (Twig-only)
slides.description: Array of content to include in the carousel. Note: each slide gets wrapped with a <bolt-carousel-slide> automatically.

slides_per_view.description: Controls the number of slides to be shown at once.

slides_per_group.description: Controls the number of slides to be swiped at once.

max_slides_per_view.description: Limits the maximum number of slides that can display at any screen size. Combine this with the slidesPerView option to get the benefits of automatically adjusting the number of slides displayed at different screen sizes while putting a max limit of how many slides display at once.

space_between.description: Controls the horizontal spacing between each slide.

slide_offset_before.description: Controls whether or not carousel content should be offset by 5px at the start.

slide_offset_after.description: Controls whether or not carousel content should be offset by 5px at the end.

nav_button_position.description: Positions the previous and next buttons to either inside or outside of the carousel container.

no_pagination.description: Removes the pagination. Not recommended unless being used with an alternative UI to display carousel progress (such as custom thumbnail previews).

no_scrollbar.description: Removes the scrollbar. Not recommended unless being used with an alternative UI to display carousel progress (such as custom thumbnail previews).

no_min_width.description: Disables the slide min width logic. Typically not recommended unless being used with an alternative UI to display carousel progress (such as custom thumbnail previews).

mode.description: Switches between the default carousel mode and the image gallery mode.

no_nav_buttons.description: Visually hide the previoius and next nav buttons.

slide_to_clicked_slide.description: Set to true and click on any slide will produce transition to this slide.

autoplay.description: Allows the carousel to automatically rotate through its slides until the user interacts with it.

loop.description: Enables continuous loop mode. Note: the loop option is temporarily disabled and will be re-enabled in a future Bolt release.

free_scroll.description: Enables content to be freely scrolled and flicked without snapping to an end position. Automatically switches off the pagination and switches on the scrollbar.

first_slide_message.description: Accessible label for the previous button when the carousel is on the first slide.

last_slide_message.description: Accessible label for previous button when the carousel is on the last slide.

pagination_bullet_message.description: Accessible label for a single pagination bullet.

schema.title: Bolt Placeholder
schema.description: Placeholders carve out space for other WIP content and components.

animated.title: Animated
animated.description: Should this placeholder have an animated border?

items.description: All of the items in the accordion. Each item should contain a header and a content.

content.description: Epanadable content of an item.

open.description: Automatically expand an item on page load.

uuid.description: Unique ID for an item, randomly generated if not provided.

open_label.description: Accessible label for the open trigger to expand an item.

close_label.description: Accessible label for the close trigger to collapse an item.

single.description: Allow only one section to open at a time.

no_separator.title: no_separator (twig) / no-separator (web component)
no_separator.description: Hides the separator in between items.

box_shadow.title: box_shadow (twig) / box-shadow (web component)
box_shadow.description: Creates a box shadow around the accordion.

spacing.description: Controls the inset spacing of each item.

icon_valign.title: icon_valign (twig) / icon-valign (web component)
icon_valign.description: Vertically align the accordion trigger content and trigger icon.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

max_items_per_row.description: The max amount of items (action blocks) to be displayed in one row.

valign.description: Vertical alignment of the content inside each action block.

borderless.description: Removes the border in between each action block.

contentItems.description: Content items to populate the action blocks.

collapse.description: `True` to hide toggle until mobile screen size

content.description: **All of the items in the dropdown** -- generally works by including `@bolt-components-nav/nav.twig` with `links` array of objects containing `text` & `url`

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

overlay.description: Should an overlay be used for this background.

shapeGroup.description: Add a Bolt Background Shapes group.

fill.description: Type of fill to use for the overlay.

focalPoint.description: Where the opacity background should originate.

vertical.description: Currently doesn't use this value. Intended future application.

contentItems.description: An array of objects to place in the background.

shapeGroup.description: The shapeGroup to use to build the shapes layout.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

content.description: Main content of the band.

upper.description: Pinned to the upper area of the band.

content.description: A pinned area can contain 1 or more items.

align.description: Horizontal alignment of a single item.

lower.description: Pinned to the lower area of the band.

content.description: A pinned area can contain 1 or more items.

align.description: Horizontal alignment of a single item.

tag.description: Controls the semantic HTML tag to use for the band's content.

size.description: Controls the vertical spacing of the band.

full_bleed.description: If set to true, the band will take the full width of the page.

theme.description: Controls the theme of the band.

row_gutter.title: DEPRECATED
row_gutter.description: Please use `pinned_content`. Instructions on how to use `pinned_content` is on the Band with Pinned Content demo page.

content_row_start.title: DEPRECATED
content_row_start.description: Please use `pinned_content`. Instructions on how to use `pinned_content` is on the Band with Pinned Content demo page.

items.title: DEPRECATED
items.description: Please use `content` and `pinned_content`. Instructions on how to use `pinned_content` is on the Band with Pinned Content demo page.

fullBleed.title: DEPRECATED
fullBleed.description: This prop has been renamed. Please use `full_bleed`.

contentTag.title: DEPRECATED
contentTag.description: This prop is no longer needed. `tag` takes care of the semantic markup automatically.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

items.title: The content items
items.description: All of the items in the block list - can have simple text **or** `items`
Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single list item

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

content.description:
Text to appear in blockquote (Twig only). May be plain text or text wrapped in

tags.

alignItems.description: Aligns items left, center, or right.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

items.description: Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single breadcrumb

schema.title: Bolt Button
schema.description: Buttons are the core of our action components.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

transform.description: Transforms the button text to various cases.

tag.description: Determines the semantic HTML tag for the button.

style.description: Style of the button determined by information hierarchy.

width.description: Controls the width of the button.

border_radius.description: Rounds the corners of the button.

align.description: Horizontal alignment of items (text and icon) inside the button. Note: the values left and right are deprecated, use start and end instead.

icon.description: Icon data as expected by the icon component. Accepts an additional position prop that determines placement within the button.

iconOnly.description: Make the button to display only the icon and hide the text (which is still required). You are required to pass both text and icon data for this option to work.

tag.description: Html tag to wrap the button group.

items.description: Bolt button information.
Bolt component information.

content.description: A string of content to place in the button group.

tag.description: Html tag immediately within the `bolt-card` element.

contentTag.description: Html tag immediately within the `bolt-card` element.

url.description: Providing a URL will make the entire card link to another resource. This is a future prop and does not do anything right now.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

url.description: Optional. When url is present, tag changes to `a`, otherwise tag would be `span`.

tag.description: Html tag to be used. If a URL is provided, this will be ignored and `a` will be always be used.

items.description: An array of Chips.
Chip.

contentItems.title: DEPRECATED
contentItems.description: Deprecated (will be removed in Bolt v3.0) - use the items prop instead.

items.description: Chip.

schema.title: Code Snippet
schema.description: Monospace Font Styles for Code Text

display.title: Display
display.description: Defines if the code text is inline or block.

syntax.title: Syntax Highlighting
syntax.description: Toggle between a light and dark syntax highlighting, or turn it off. Separate from Bolt theming.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

copiedText.title: DEPRECATED
copiedText.description: Use the custom_confirmation property instead if you need to change the confirmation text.

iconSize.title: DEPRECATED
iconSize.description: Use custom_trigger, custom_transition, and custom_confirmation properties if you need to change icon size.

trigger_text.description: Text to use for the inital copy button.  Ignored if the custom_trigger property is used.

text_to_copy.description: The text to copy to the clipboard.

custom_trigger.description: (optional) Custom content to show for the initial copy trigger.  If you pass a link, set the URL to '#!' since it should not being followed.

custom_transition.description: (optional) Custom content to show while copy is in progress.  This content will be rotated while the copying happens, so it's recommended to pass an icon.

custom_confirmation.description: (optional) Custom content to show after a successful copy.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

media.description: Media accepts either image, icon, video, or table.

content.title: DEPRECATED.
content.description: Figure contains no content. Only media and caption.

icon_size.description: Customize the size of the input icon used

text.description: Renderable text content of the headline.

url.description: If provided, turns headline into a link to given url.

icon.description: Bolt icon. Accepts either 1) an icon name as a string 2) an icon object as expected by `@bolt-components-icon` or 3) the string "none" to explicitly remove default icons

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

background.description: Background shape. This applies *only* to 'xlarge' icons.

color.description: Icon color. Currently only support default (black) and teal.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

lazyload.description: Lazyload can boost performance by loading images on demand, instead of on initial page load.

no_lazy.description: Override the default lazyload behavior. Used only on the web component, where the presence of a boolean property always equates to `true`.

placeholder_color.description: A valid CSS background color property shown while image loads.

placeholder_image.description: Image path or image data shown while image loads.

srcset.description: A comma seperated string of image urls and image widths, used for optimizing image loading performance.

sizes.description: A list of one or more strings separated by commas indicating a set of source sizes. Each source size consists of a media condition (omitted for the last item), and a source size value. Learn more.

ratio.title: boolean option is DEPRECATED
ratio.description: Set the aspect ratio for the image via slash-separated width and height values, e.g. 4/3. Currently required for aspect ratio to be applied properly. Set to "none" to opt out of aspect ratio.

max_width.description: Set the max-width of the image as a valid CSS value, e.g. "300px" or "50%".

width.title: DEPRECATED
width.description: Override the default width of the image. If no height is provided, aspect ratio will be maintained.

height.title: DEPRECATED
height.description: Override the default height of the image. If no width is provided, aspect ratio will be maintained.

cover.description: Set an image to fill its container.

imageAttributes.title: DEPRECATED
imageAttributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

display.description: Display either an inline link or flex link (icons can hang on either side).

valign.description: Controls the vertical alignment of text and icon.

text.description: Renderable text content for the link.

url.description: Contains a URL that the link points to. This may also be passed as part of `attributes`.

target.description: Specifies where to display the linked URL. This may also be passed as part of `attributes`.

icon.description: Bolt icon. Accepts the same options as Bolt Icon Component `@bolt-components-icon` plus an additional 'position' parameter that determines placement within the button.

isHeadline.description: Whether this link should get special headline styling treatment.

schema.title: List
schema.description: Minimal list component for laying out a group of items.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

items.description: All items can be simple text or `items`.
Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single list item.

tag.description: Apply the semantic tag for the list.

display.description: Display either an inline list of items or a block (stacked) list of items. Responsive options are also available for transforming from block to inline at specific breakpoints.

spacing.description: Control the spacing in between items.

separator.description: Display a separator in between items.

inset.description: Turn spacing to the inside of each item.

align.description: Control the horizontal alignment of items.

valign.description: Control the vertical alignment of items.

attributes.title: Attributes (Twig-only)
attributes.description: A Drupal attributes object. Used to apply with extra HTML attributes to the outer <bolt-modal> tag.

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: Default `disabled` prop supported globally by most Bolt components.

no_shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Twig-only)
no_shadow.description: Manually disables the component from rendering to the Shadow DOM in a Twig template. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is handled globally based on browser support.

no-shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Web Component-only)
no-shadow.description: Manually disables the web component from rendering to the Shadow DOM. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is handled globally based on browser support.

width.description: Controls the width of the modal container.

spacing.description: Controls the spacing around the modal container.

theme.description: Controls the color theme of the modal container.

uuid.description: Unique ID for modal, randomly generated if not provided.

slots.description: There are 3 sections (slots) within the modal container. By assigning the appropriate slot name, content will be passed into the respective section.

default.description: The body section of the modal container.

header.description: The header section of the modal container.

footer.description: The footer section of the modal container.

offset.description: Number of pixels taken up by sticky items at the top of the page.  Used for smooth scroll and gumshoe.

moreText.description: Button text that displays when the Priority+ Nav Dropdown is displayed

offset.description: (Inherited from nav-indicator) Number of pixels taken up by sticky items at the top of the page.  Used for smooth scroll and gumshoe.

theme.description: Color theme. Can be set to 'none' for a transparent background.

title.description: Navbar title. Icon is optional. Tag can be set to h1 to h6 depending on the page.

name.description: Name of the (optional) icon to be used.

center.description: Determines if you want the Navbar content to be center aligned or not

width.description: Adjusts the Navbar's overall maximum width behavior -- either filling up the entire browser's total screen width (full) or just the component's parent container width (auto).

moreText.description: (Inherited from nav-priority) Button text that displays when the Priority+ Nav Dropdown is displayed.

offset.description: (Inherited from nav-indicator) Number of pixels taken up by sticky items at the top of the page.  Used for smooth scroll and gumshoe.

schema.title: Navlink
schema.description: Navlinks are stylized links used within the Navbar

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

active.description: Automatically mark a Navlink as active

text.description: Renderable text content for the link.

url.description: A url to link to.  This may also be passed as part of `attributes`

icon.description: Icon data as expected by the icon component.  Accepts an additional 'position' parameter that determines placement within the Navlink.

schema.title: Logo
schema.description: Note that logo accepts all the same parameters as the bolt-image component in addition to the properties below.

invert.description: Set to true to invert the logo colors.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

pages.description: A keyed array of page item objects where the key is the page number

items.description: A single page link object

href.description: The link for this pager item.  Href may also be passed as part of attributes (which will take precedence).

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object for this link.

first.description: A link object for the first page

href.description: The link for this pager item. Href may also be passed as part of attributes (which will take precedence).

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object for this link.

previous.description: A link object for the previous page (e.g. if on page 3, this links to page 2)

href.description: The link for this pager item. Href may also be passed as part of attributes (which will take precedence)

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object for this link.

next.description: A link object for the next page (e.g. if on page 3, this links to page 4)

href.description: The link for this pager item. Href may also be passed as part of attributes (which will take precedence)

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object for this link.

last.description: A link object for the last page

href.description: The link for this pager item. Href may also be passed as part of attributes (which will take precedence)

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object for this link.

previousText.title: Previous text
previousText.description: Text to be displayed for the previous anchor

nextText.title: Next text
nextText.description: Text to be displayed for the next anchor

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

text.description: Defines the label text in front of the social icons.

size.description: Controls the size of icons and spacing.

align.description: Controls the horizontal alignment of label text and icons.

opacity.description: Controls the overall transparency of the share tool.

sources.description: Social media sources to share to.

name.description: Name of the social media source.

url.description: The specifically formed share URL with query string.

inline.title: DPRECATED.
inline.description: Button version has been removed so this prop is no longer needed.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

content.description: Renderable content (e.g. a string, render array, or included pattern) to display within a modal at mobile breakpoints.  Typically, this is where the filters themselves go.

attributes.title: Attributes (Twig-only)
attributes.description: A Drupal attributes object. Used to apply with extra HTML attributes to the outer <bolt-stack> tag.

spacing.description: Control the spacing in between items.

content.description: Content of the stack.

no_shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Twig-only)
no_shadow.description: Manually disables the component from rendering to the Shadow DOM in a Twig template. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is handled globally based on browser support.

no-shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Web Component-only)
no-shadow.description: Manually disables the web component from rendering to the Shadow DOM. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is handled globally based on browser support.

schema.title: Table
schema.description: Table layout for tabular content.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

headers.description: Generates top and side headers, each can contain an array of `cells`.

cells.description: Each item represents a cell in the top header.
Each item represents a cell in the side header.

rows.description: Generates an array of rows, each can contain an array of `cells`.

cells.description: Each item represents a cell in a row.

footer.description: Generates a table footer, can contain an array of `cells`.

cells.description: Each item represents a cell in the footer.

format.description: Display either a regular table or a more complex numeric table.

borderless.description: Removes the vertical border in between cells.

first_col_fixed_width.description: Sets the width of the first column to be as wide as the longest text.

headlines.description: An array of headline component objects

items.description: Headline text components

content.description: Body text of teaser

buttons.description: An array of button component objects

items.description: A button

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

display.description: Inline text or a block of text.

color.description: Text color in context of theme colors.

line-height.description: Line height in context of the typographic design.

letter-spacing.description: Letter spacing in context of the typographic design.

text-transform.description: Transform controls the type case. Please note that capitalize would capitalize the first letter of each word, it is not the same as title case.

font-family.description: Font family in context of the typographic design.

font-size.description: Font size in context of the typographic design.

font-weight.description: Font weight in context of the typographic design.

headline.description: A preset for headlines in context of the typographic design.

subheadline.description: A preset for subheadlines in context of the typographic design.

eyebrow.description: A preset for eyebrow in context of the typographic design.

url.description: If provided, turns headline into a link to given url.

util.description: Each item in the array will build a utility class. No need to include `u-bolt-`. **For the web component** use comma separated string.

trigger.description: Provides the data for our trigger type

type.description: What kind of trigger are we using?

icon.description: Properties for including an icon with our trigger

name.description: Name of the icon to be used

toggle.description: If using a `button` set optional toggle text / icon

content.description: This can be text OR an included bolt component (like Block List)

direction.description: Should tooltip push up or down?

spacing.description: Spacing within our tooltip content bubble

schema.title: Bolt Trigger
schema.description: Triggers add button or link behavior to any content without the default button or link styles.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

content.description: Main content of the trigger (Twig only).

url.description: Contains a URL that the link points to. This may also be passed as part of `attributes`.

target.description: Specifies where to display the linked URL. This may also be passed as part of `attributes`.

cursor.description: Type of cursor shown on hover.

on_click.description: The name of a method on the `on_click_target`.

on_click_target.description: `className` (e.g. "js-click-me") used in `querySelector` to reference a web component on the page. `onClick`, the `on_click` method name will be called on this element.

no_outline.description: Turn off the default outline on focus

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

items.description: A single list item object with either a `text` or `contentItems` key
All items can be simple text or `items`.
Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single list item.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

items.description: A single list item object with either a `text` or `contentItems` key
All items can be simple text or `items`.
Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single list item.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

accountID.description: ID of the Brightcove account that owns the video.

videoUuid.description: A unique identifying string, randomly generated if not provided.

share_description.description: A custom title to use in the share overlay

collapsed.description: Should the video be collapsed on load.

showMeta.description: Should the video show meta data.

showMetaTitle.description: Should the video show meta title.

controls.description: Should the video controls be available.

autoplay.description: Should the video auto-play on load.

isBackgroundVideo.description: Set to true if the video is a background.

on_init.description: The `on_init` config allows for an external Javascript function inlined on the page to add any 3rd party scripts or video plugins to a `<bolt-video>` player instance when initializing. Please see the new recommended `enabled_plugins` and `disabled_plugins` options below.

default_plugins.description: An array of the default `<bolt-video>` player plugins that are globally enabled by default.

available_plugins.description: The built-in `<bolt-video>` player plugins that are availble to be used in any player instance without requiring the use of any extra Javascript.

enabled_plugins.description: Space-separated list of built-in `<bolt-video>` plugins for Brightcove to enable. Current include `social`, `email`, `playback`, and `cue`. For example: `<bolt-video enabled-plugins="cue social email playback">`.

disabled_plugins.description: Space-separated list of any built-in `<bolt-video>` plugins for Brightcove to disable. Used to opt-out of any video plugins that are enabled by default (ex. the `playback` plugin). For example: `<bolt-video disabled-plugins="playback">`.

schema.title: Bolt Grid
schema.description: A flexible 12-column grid with responsive breakpoint options.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

gutter.description: Spacing between the columns of the grid.

row_gutter.description: Spacing between the rows of the grid.

items.description: Array of grid items to render inside the grid.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

content.description: Content to render inside each grid item.

valign.description: Vertical alignment of the grid item itself.

column_start.description: The vertical starting point of the grid item. This accepts any number from `1` to `12`, and their perspective responsive variations for advanced usage, for example, `6@small` means the column start is set at 6 for any browser width larger and equal to the small breakpoint. This prop is required to make the grid work in Internet Explorer.

column_span.description: The number of columns the grid item should span across. This accepts any number from `1` to `12`, and their perspective responsive variations for advanced usage, for example, `6@small` means the column span is set at 6 for any browser width larger and equal to the small breakpoint.

row_start.description: The horizontal starting point of the grid item. This prop is required to make the grid work in Internet Explorer.

row_span.description: The number of rows the grid item should span across.

schema.title: Bolt Ratio
schema.description: A small helper-component that display's nested content / other components at a specific aspect ratio.

attributes.title: Attributes (Twig-only)
attributes.description: A Drupal attributes object. Used to apply with extra HTML attributes to the outer <bolt-ratio> tag.

children.title: Children (Twig-only)
children.description: Nested content to nest inside the <bolt-ratio> component when used in a Twig template.

ratio.title: Ratio (Twig & Web Component)
ratio.description: Set the aspect ratio for the ratio object via slash-separated width and height values, e.g. 4/3, 16/9, 1/1, etc.

aspectRatioWidth.title: Deprecated
aspectRatioWidth.description: Twig-specific prop for setting the width portion of the component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

aspect-ratio-width.title: Deprecated
aspect-ratio-width.description: Web component-specific prop for setting the width portion of the bolt-ratio web component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

aspectRatioHeight.title: Deprecated
aspectRatioHeight.description: Twig-specific prop for setting the height portion of the component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

aspect-ratio-height.title: Deprecated
aspect-ratio-height.description: Web component-specific prop for setting the height portion of the bolt-ratio web component's aspect ratio. Will be removed in Bolt v3.0. Use the simpler ratio prop instead.

no_css_vars.title: Disable CSS Custom Prop Rendering (Twig-only)
no_css_vars.description: Manually disables CSS Variable-based rendering for <bolt-ratio> in Twig templates. Useful for testing cross browser functionality. By default this is automatically enabled / disabled based on browser support for CSS Vars.

no-css-vars.title: No CSS Vars (Web Component-only)
no-css-vars.description: Manually disables CSS Variable-based rendering on the <bolt-ratio> custom element. Useful for testing cross browser functionality. By default this is automatically enabled / disabled based on browser support for CSS Vars.

no_shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Twig-only)
no_shadow.description: Manually disables the component from rendering to the Shadow DOM in a Twig template. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is enabled / disabled based on browser support.

no-shadow.title: Disable Shadow DOM (Web Component-only)
no-shadow.description: Manually disables the web component from rendering to the Shadow DOM. Useful for testing cross browser functionality / rendering behavior. By default this is enabled / disabled based on browser support.

attributes.description: A Drupal-style attributes object with extra attributes to append to this component.

item.description: Renderable content (i.e. a string, render array, or included pattern) for a single list item.
